japanese:
五月、何かあったのか？
向こうまで声が届いてたぞ。
translation:
Itsuki, did something happen?
I could hear your voice all the way over here.

japanese:
あっ、上杉君！？
四葉が――
translation:
Ah, Uesugi-kun?!
Yotsuba is%p-2;――

japanese:
うーえすーぎさーん！
ほら、見てくださーい！
translation:
UESUGI-SAAAN!
Hey, look here!

japanese:
うお！？
お前、花火を何本持ってるんだよ？
translation:
WOAH?!
How many fireworks are you carrying?

japanese:
さーて、何本でしょう！
わかりますかー？
translation:
Hmm, now I wonder!
Can you figure it out?

japanese:
しかも、それ手筒花火じゃねーか。
そんなに持ったらさすがに危なすぎるだろ。
translation:
And, those are hand-held bamboo fireworks.
It's gotta be dangerous if you're carrying that many around.

japanese: 大丈夫です、これくらいは普通です！
translation: It's okay, I always carry that many around!

japanese:
お前には普通かもしれないけどな……
とりあえず、らいはが真似したら危ないから、
その花火は消してくれ。
translation:
It might be normal for YOU...
but it's dangerous for Raiha if she imitates you!
Please put the fireworks out.

japanese:
あっ、それはダメですね！
すぐに消してきます！
translation:
Aaaah, you're right!
I'll put them out right now.

japanese:
すみません、私が綺麗だと言ったことが
四葉をたきつけてしまったのかもしれません。
translation: Sorry, I said that these were pretty and Yotsuba got carried away.

japanese: あー、ありそうだな。
translation: Ah, that makes sense.

japanese:
って、今度はなにしてるんだ？
あいつ、ふらふら岩場のほうに行ってるぞ。
translation:
What is she up to now?
Oh no! She's wandering towards the rocky area.

japanese: ええっ！？
translation: WHAAA?!

japanese:
四葉、なにしてるんですかー！
そっちに行くと危ないですよー！
translation:
Yotsuba, what are you doing?!
That way is dangerous!

japanese:
魚を見てるのー！
花火の光で集まって来たりしてないか気になって！
translation:
I'm looking at the fish!
I wonder if they'll gather together to watch the firework!

japanese:
上杉さーん！
明かりで魚を集める漁ってありましたよねー？
やってみたらどうでしょー！
translation:
Uesugi-san!
There's a fishing method were you bait out the fish using light, right?

japanese:
いいから戻ってこい！
夜の海は危ないぞ！
translation:
Doesn't matter! Come back here!
The ocean is dangerous at night!

japanese: はーい！　今、戻りますねー！
translation: Okay! I'll come back now!

japanese:
走らないでいいですから、
足元には気をつけてください！
translation:
You don't need to run.
Please watch your step!

japanese: ただいま戻りました！
translation: I'm back!

japanese:
もう、あまり心配させないでください。
海に落ちたらどうするつもりだったんですか。
translation:
Don't make us worry about you.
What would you do if you fell into the ocean?

japanese:
ごめんね。
魚が捕れたらいいのにって思ったら、つい。
translation:
Sorry.
I was just thinking it'd be nice if we caught some fish.

japanese: で、いたのか？
translation: Did you see any fish?

japanese:
それが全然見えませんでした。
夜の海って真っ黒になっちゃうんですね。
translation:
Unfortunately, I didn't see any at all.
The ocean at night truly is pitch-black.

japanese:
戻れる目処もつきましたし、
危険を冒して魚を捕る必要は……。
translation:
We're going to return home soon,
that's why you don't need to take any risks catching fish...

japanese:
だな。
今は花火を楽しむぞ。
translation:
Right.
Let's enjoy the fireworks now.

japanese:
確かにあるぞ！
それはそうとして、危ないから戻ってこい！
translation:
Yeah, there is!
But either way, it's dangerous! Come back!

japanese: はい！　ただいま戻りました！
translation: Okay! I'm back!

japanese: もう、あまり心配させないでください。
translation: Don't make us worry about you.

japanese: ごめんごめん、気になっちゃって。
translation: Sorry, sorry. I was just so curious.

japanese: それで、魚はいたのか？
translation: Did you see any fish?

japanese:
う～ん、暗くてよく見えませんでしたが、
集まってなかったみたいです。
translation:
Well, it was dark, so I couldn't really see if any fish
gathered around the fireworks.

japanese:
さっき四葉が言ってたのは、魚やイカが
光に集まる習性を利用した集魚灯漁業ってやつだ。
が、花火程度の明かりじゃ無理だろうな。
translation:
What Yotsuba was speaking of, was using luring lights to catch certain 
types of fish and squid. But I guess it's impossible to use the 
lights from fireworks.

japanese: しかし、そんなことを知ってるなんて驚いたぞ。
translation: However, I'm surprised you knew that.

japanese:
いえ、たまたまですよ。
前にテレビで見たことがあったので。
translation:
Nah, it's just a coincidence.
I saw it on TV before.

japanese:
よく覚えてたじゃないか。
知識を活かそうとする姿勢も素晴らしいぞ！
translation:
You did a good job memorizing it.
Your willingness to use that knowledge is wonderful too!

japanese:
えへへ……。
まさかここで褒められるとは思いませんでした。
translation:
Ehehe...
I didn't think you'd compliment me just for that.

japanese:
ですが、戻れる目処もつきましたし、
暗い海でわざわざ魚を捕る必要は……。
translation:
We're going to return home soon,
that's why you don't need to take any risks catching fish...

japanese:
だな。
今は花火を楽しむぞ。
translation:
Right.
Let's enjoy the fireworks now.

japanese:
五月が心配してるぞ！
危ないから早く戻ってこい！
translation:
Itsuki is worried about you!
Hurry up and come back!

japanese:
あっ！　はい！
すぐに戻りまーす！
translation:
Ah! Okay!
I'll head back now!

japanese:
五月、ごめんね！
心配させちゃった？
魚が捕れたらいいなって思ったらつい……。
translation:
Itsuki, I'm sorry!
Did you worry about me? I was just thinking
it'd be nice to catch some fish...

japanese:
もう……。
もし海に落ちでもしたら
無事ではすまなかったかもしれませんよ？
translation:
Come on...
If you had fallen into the ocean,
you might have gotten into some real trouble, you know?

japanese:
五月の言うとおりだぞ。
夜の海はお前が思っている以上に危険なんだ。
translation:
Itsuki's right.
The ocean at night is more dangerous than you think.

japanese: はーい……。
translation: Okay...

japanese:
まあ、幸い何事もなかったことだし
五月も許してくれるさ。
なあ？
translation:
Well, fortunately nothing happened
and Itsuki will forgive you.
Right?

japanese:
ええ、もちろんです。
四葉の無事が一番ですから。
translation:
Yes, of course.
Your safety is the highest priority, Yotsuba.

japanese:
ですが、戻れる目処もつきましたし、
危険を冒してまで魚を捕る必要はありませんよ。
translation:
We're going to return home soon,
that's why you don't need to take any risks catching fish...

japanese:
だな。
今は花火を楽しむぞ。
translation:
Right.
Let's enjoy the fireworks now.

japanese:
はい！
じゃあ、私はこの花火で！
……それ！
translation:
Alrighty then!
I'll light the firework!
...There we go!

japanese: 上杉さんはどれにしますか？
translation: Uesugi-san, which one would you like?

japanese:
俺はコイツだな。
なかなか派手そうだ。
translation:
I'll take this one.
It looks really fancy.

japanese:
おお！　火花の勢いがスゴイですね！
五月はどれにする？
translation:
Oooh! The power of that firework is amazing!
Itsuki, which one do you want?

japanese: ……あれ？
translation: ...Huh?

japanese:
どうしたの？
上手く点かなかった？
translation:
What's wrong?
It didn't ignite well?

japanese: はい、湿気っていたのでしょうか？
translation: No it didn't, I wonder if it got wet or something?

japanese:
それじゃ、はい。
私の花火で点けてあげるよ。
translation:
Alrighty then!
I'll ignite yours with mine.

japanese:
あっ、点きました。
ありがとうございます。
translation: Thank you for igniting the firework.

japanese:
お礼なんていいよ！
これは、可愛い妹に心配かけちゃった
お詫びってことで。
translation:
Don't thank me!
This is just an apology for making my sweet sister worry about me.

japanese: ふふ、そうですね……。
translation: Teehee, I see...

japanese: って、それとこれは別問題では？
translation:
Yet, this and you running into the ocean during the night is a different 
matter all together, you know?

japanese: あはは、バレちゃったか～。
translation: Ahaha, you caught me.

japanese:
（一応、姉としての自覚はあったんだな。
　四葉のほうが子どもっぽいが……
　いや、五月も大概か）
translation:
(I guess she's aware that she's the older sister.
 Yotsuba is more childish, but...
 Itsuki is childish too, most of the time.)

japanese: （そういうところも五つ子なのかもな）
translation: (It must be another quintuplet thing.)
